title: How to Make Macaroni and Cheese
description:
Learn How to Make Macaroni and Cheese with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Macaroni-and-Cheese

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make macaroni and cheese first bring a large pot of water to a boil at a dash of salt to give the macaroni more flavor next pour one box or eight ounces of macaroni into the pot and let it cook until it's cooked through but firm when you bite it this should take about eight minutes drain the macaroni and set aside now melt a fourth cup 55 grams of butter in a pan over medium heat add 1/4 cup 32 grams of flour 1/2 TSP 2.5 grams of salt and a dash of black pepper to the pan then stir everything together until the mixture is smooth next stir 2 cups 475 milliliters of the milk to the mixture until it's bubbling which should take about 5 minutes add 2 cups 250 grams of shredded cheddar cheese and stir everything for a few more minutes until the cheese is melted finally fold the cooked macaroni into the cheese mixture and enjoyto make macaroni and cheese first bring a large pot of water to a boil at a dash of salt to give the macaroni more flavor next pour one box or eight ounces of macaroni into the pot and let it cook until it's cooked through but firm when you bite it this should take about eight minutes drain the macaroni and set aside now melt a fourth cup 55 grams of butter in a pan over medium heat add 1/4 cup 32 grams of flour 1/2 TSP 2.5 grams of salt and a dash of black pepper to the pan then stir everything together until the mixture is smooth next stir 2 cups 475 milliliters of the milk to the mixture until it's bubbling which should take about 5 minutes add 2 cups 250 grams of shredded cheddar cheese and stir everything for a few more minutes until the cheese is melted finally fold the cooked macaroni into the cheese mixture and enjoy

subtitles: to make muesli start by mixing four cups of grains such as rolled oats wheat flakes and one cup of your favorite chopped nuts in a large bowl then stir in one cup of dried fruit like dates raisins dehydrated berries and dried mango be sure to store your muesli in an airtight container in a cupboard where it can stay fresh for up to two months when you're ready to have some of your muesli serve it with some milk or yogurt in a bowl and enjoy to learn how to make muesli variations scroll downto make muesli start by mixing four cups of grains such as rolled oats wheat flakes and one cup of your favorite chopped nuts in a large bowl then stir in one cup of dried fruit like dates raisins dehydrated berries and dried mango be sure to store your muesli in an airtight container in a cupboard where it can stay fresh for up to two months when you're ready to have some of your muesli serve it with some milk or yogurt in a bowl and enjoy to learn how to make muesli variations scroll down

title: How to Make Olive Oil
description:
Learn how to make olive oil with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Olive-Oil

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make olive oil start by crushing the olives into a paste with a meat tenderizer next mix the paste with hot water and grind it with an immersion blender until you see beads of oil rising to the surface then vigorously stir the paste with a spoon for at least 5 minutes until larger beads of oil form finally drape a cheesecloth over a strainer and scoop the paste onto the center of the cheesecloth let the liquid drain for 30 minutes then siphon the top layer of oil and transfer it to a glass containerto make olive oil start by crushing the olives into a paste with a meat tenderizer next mix the paste with hot water and grind it with an immersion blender until you see beads of oil rising to the surface then vigorously stir the paste with a spoon for at least 5 minutes until larger beads of oil form finally drape a cheesecloth over a strainer and scoop the paste onto the center of the cheesecloth let the liquid drain for 30 minutes then siphon the top layer of oil and transfer it to a glass container

subtitles: to make porridge on the stove combine one cup or 90 grams of rolled oats and three cups or 750 milliliters of water in a pot over medium heat until the water starts to boil then turn the heat down to low and let the oats simmer for five minutes stirring regularly to make your porridge sweeter add a dash of brown sugar or honey while it's simmering after five minutes transfer your porridge to a bowl add your favorite toppings and serveto make porridge on the stove combine one cup or 90 grams of rolled oats and three cups or 750 milliliters of water in a pot over medium heat until the water starts to boil then turn the heat down to low and let the oats simmer for five minutes stirring regularly to make your porridge sweeter add a dash of brown sugar or honey while it's simmering after five minutes transfer your porridge to a bowl add your favorite toppings and serve

title: How to Make Royal Icing
description:
Learn How to Make Royal Icing with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Royal-Icing

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make royal icing first crack one egg and separate the white from the yolk pour the egg white into a large mixing bowl then add 4 cups 500 grams of powdered sugar add a few drops of food coloring if you want colored icing beat the sugar and the egg white together with an electric mixer on low speed until they're fully combined which should only take a minute or two if you want thinner royal icing beat in one to two drops of water or lemon juice at a time until it reaches the right consistencyto make royal icing first crack one egg and separate the white from the yolk pour the egg white into a large mixing bowl then add 4 cups 500 grams of powdered sugar add a few drops of food coloring if you want colored icing beat the sugar and the egg white together with an electric mixer on low speed until they're fully combined which should only take a minute or two if you want thinner royal icing beat in one to two drops of water or lemon juice at a time until it reaches the right consistency

title: How to Make Salt Dough
description:
Learn How to Make Salt Dough with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Salt-Dough

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make salto first pre-heat your oven to 180 degrees Fahrenheit 80 degrees Celsius then mix together two cups 255 grams of flour 1 cup 200 grams of salt 3/4 cup 180 milliliters of water and 2 tablespoons 30 milliliters of vegetable oil in a bowl stir the mixture until its clump free and doughy next knead it with your hands to thicken it up mold the dough into whatever shape you want and set it on a baking sheet and put it in the oven 10 minutes to dry and Harden you can also set it out for a week to air dry your dough is dry when you could tap it without pushing it in at all making a hollow sound store any leftover dough in an airtight container for up to a weekto make salto first pre-heat your oven to 180 degrees Fahrenheit 80 degrees Celsius then mix together two cups 255 grams of flour 1 cup 200 grams of salt 3/4 cup 180 milliliters of water and 2 tablespoons 30 milliliters of vegetable oil in a bowl stir the mixture until its clump free and doughy next knead it with your hands to thicken it up mold the dough into whatever shape you want and set it on a baking sheet and put it in the oven 10 minutes to dry and Harden you can also set it out for a week to air dry your dough is dry when you could tap it without pushing it in at all making a hollow sound store any leftover dough in an airtight container for up to a week

subtitles: to make sauteed chicken start by cutting chicken breasts into thin slices or bite-sized pieces then heat some oil in a pan over medium heat and add the chicken cook the chicken for five to seven minutes stirring and flipping it over every couple of minutes so it cooks evenly while it's cooking add seasonings like salt pepper and garlic powder after five to seven minutes transfer the chicken to a plate and serve youto make sauteed chicken start by cutting chicken breasts into thin slices or bite-sized pieces then heat some oil in a pan over medium heat and add the chicken cook the chicken for five to seven minutes stirring and flipping it over every couple of minutes so it cooks evenly while it's cooking add seasonings like salt pepper and garlic powder after five to seven minutes transfer the chicken to a plate and serve you

title: How to Make Scrambled Eggs in a Microwave
description:
Learn how to make scrambled eggs in a microwave with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Scrambled-Eggs-in-a-Microwave

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make scrambled eggs in a microwave start by coating a microwave safe bowl with cooking spray or butter next put your cracked eggs and a tablespoon of milk into the bowl and whisk them together then microwave the eggs for one minute on 100 power when the timer goes off remove the bowl with oven mitts stir the eggs and continue microwaving them for 30 second intervals until they're solid to learn how to prepare your scrambled eggs in an alternative way in the microwave keep readingto make scrambled eggs in a microwave start by coating a microwave safe bowl with cooking spray or butter next put your cracked eggs and a tablespoon of milk into the bowl and whisk them together then microwave the eggs for one minute on 100 power when the timer goes off remove the bowl with oven mitts stir the eggs and continue microwaving them for 30 second intervals until they're solid to learn how to prepare your scrambled eggs in an alternative way in the microwave keep reading
